briefdescription.para: namelist interface

detaileddescription.para: The time interval that write out intermediate restart file. The format is (yr,mo,day,hr,min,sec). When restart_interval is all zero, no intermediate restart file will be written out

briefdescription.para: The date that the current integration starts with. (See force_date_from_namelist.)

detaileddescription.para: The calendar type used by the current integration. Valid values are consistent with the time_manager module: 'gregorian', 'julian', 'noleap', or 'thirty_day'. The value 'no_calendar' cannot be used because the time_manager's date functions are used. All values must be lower case.

briefdescription.para: Flag that determines whether the namelist variable current_date should override the date in the restart file INPUT/coupler.res. If the restart file does not exist then force_date_from_namelist has no effect, the value of current_date will be used.
Number of months the current integration will be run.
Number of days the current integration will be run.
Number of hours the current integration will be run.
Number of minutes the current integration will be run.
Number of seconds the current integration will be run.
Atmospheric model time step in seconds, including the fast coupling with land and sea ice.
Time step in seconds for coupling between ocean and atmospheric models. This must be an integral multiple of dt_atmos and dt_ocean. This is the "slow" timestep.
The number of MPI tasks to use for the atmosphere.
The number of MPI tasks to use for the ocean.
The number of MPI tasks to use for the ice.
The number of MPI tasks to use for the land.
Number of OpenMP threads to use in the atmosphere.
Number of OpenMP threads to use in the ocean.
Number of threads to use for the radiation.

Indicates if this component should be executed. If .FALSE., then execution is skipped. This is used when ALL the output fields sent by this component to the coupler have been overridden using the data_override feature. This is for advanced users only.
See do_atmos.
See do_atmos.
See do_atmos.
See do_atmos.

If .TRUE., the ocean executes concurrently with the atmosphere-land-ice on a separate set of PEs. Concurrent should be .TRUE. if concurrent_ice is .TRUE. If .FALSE., the execution is serial: call atmos... followed by call ocean...
If .TRUE. then radiation is done concurrently.

If .TRUE., the ocean is forced with SBCs from one coupling timestep ago. If .FALSE., the ocean is forced with most recent SBCs. For an old leapfrog MOM4 coupling with dt_cpld=dt_ocean, lag fluxes can be shown to be stable and current fluxes to be unconditionally unstable. For dt_cpld>dt_ocean there is probably sufficient damping for MOM4. For more modern ocean models (such as MOM5, GOLD or MOM6) that do not use leapfrog timestepping, use_lag_fluxes=.False. should be much more stable.

If .TRUE., the slow sea-ice is forced with the fluxes that were used for the fast ice processes one timestep before. When used in conjuction with setting slow_ice_with_ocean=.TRUE., this approach allows the atmosphere and ocean to run concurrently even if use_lag_fluxes=.FALSE., and it can be shown to ameliorate or eliminate several ice-ocean coupled instabilities.
If true, the slow sea-ice is advanced on the ocean processors. Otherwise the slow sea-ice processes are on the same PEs as the fast sea-ice.

detaileddescription.para: If true, there is a single call from the coupler to advance both the slow sea-ice and the ocean. slow_ice_with_ocean and concurrent_ice must both be true if combined_ice_and_ocean is true.

briefdescription.para: If .TRUE., do multiple checksums throughout the execution of the model.
If .TRUE., do checksums of the initial and final states.
If .TRUE. print additional debugging messages.
-1: never 0: at end of run only n>0: every n coupled steps
coupled model initial date

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Ocean, Land, Ice, Ocean_state, Atmos_land_boundary, Atmos_ice_boundary, Ocean_ice_boundary, Ice_ocean_boundary, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Land_ice_boundary, Ice_ocean_driver_CS, Ice_bc_restart, Ocn_bc_restart, ensemble_pelist, slow_ice_ocean_pelist, conc_nthreads, coupler_clocks, coupler_components_obj, coupler_chksum_obj, Time_step_cpld, Time_step_atmos, Time_atmos, Time_ocean, num_cpld_calls, num_atmos_calls, Time, Time_start, Time_end, Time_restart, Time_restart_current)
memberdef.name: coupler_init

briefdescription.para: Initialize all defined exchange grids and all boundary maps.

inbodydescription.para: The pelists need to be set before initializing the clocks
Initialize coupler_components_obj memebers to point to model components

memberdef.argsstring: (this, Atm, Land, Ice, Ocean, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Atmos_land_boundary, Atmos_ice_boundary, Land_ice_boundary, Ice_ocean_boundary, Ocean_ice_boundary)
memberdef.name: initialize_coupler_components_obj

briefdescription.para: This subroutine associates the pointer in an object of coupler_components_type to the model components.

Function get_component returns the requested component in the coupler_components_type object Users are required to provide the component to be retrieved as an input argument. For example, coupler_components_objget_component(Atm) will return Atm = coupler_components_objAtm.

parameterdescription.para: requested component to be retrieve. retrieve_component can be of type atmos_data_type, land_data_type, ice_data_type, ocean_public_type, land_ice_atmos_boundary_type, atmos_land_boundary_type, atmos_ice_boundary_type, land_ice_boundary_type, ice_ocean_boundary_type, ocean_ice_boundary_type

briefdescription.para: This subroutine associates the pointer in an object of coupler_chksum_type to the component models.
This subroutine retrieves coupler_chksum_objcomponents_obj.

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Land, Ice, Ocean, Ocean_state, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Atmos_ice_boundary, Atmos_land_boundary, Ice_ocean_boundary, Ocean_ice_boundary, Ocn_bc_restart, Ice_bc_restart, current_timestep, Time_current, Time_start, Time_end, Time_restart_current, coupler_chksum_obj, coupler_clocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_end

briefdescription.para: This subroutine finalizes the run including a final call to get_coupler_chksums if do_chksum = .True. Coupler_restart is called for the final time.

parameterdescription.para: Time corresponding to last restart time

briefdescription.para: Register the axis data as a variable in the netcdf file and add some dummy data. This is needed so the combiner can work correctly when the io_layout is not 1,1.

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Ice, Ocean, Ocn_bc_restart, Ice_bc_restart, Time_current, Time_restart_current, Time_start, time_stamp)
memberdef.name: coupler_restart

briefdescription.para: Writing restart file that contains running time and restart file writing time.
Print out checksums for several atm, land and ice variables.

parameterdescription.para: id to label CHECKSUMS in stdout

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls coupler_chksum as well as atmos_ice_land_chksum and ocean_chksum.

parameterdescription.para: ID labelling the set of checksums

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls subroutine that will print out checksums of the elements of the appropriate type. For coupled models typically these types are not defined on all processors. It is assumed that the appropriate pelist has been set before entering this routine. This can be achieved in the following way. if(atm%pe)then callmpp_set_current_pelist(atm%pelist) callatmos_ice_land_chksum('MAIN_LOOP-',nc) endif If you are on the global pelist before you enter this routine using the above call, you can return to the global pelist by invoking callmpp_set_current_pelist() after you exit. This is only necessary if you need to return to the global pelist.

parameterdescription.para: id to label CHECKSUMS in stdout

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls subroutine that will print out checksums of the elements of the appropriate type. For coupled models typically these types are not defined on all processors. It is assumed that the appropriate pelist has been set before entering this routine. This can be achieved in the following way. if(ice%slow_ice_pe)then callmpp_set_current_pelist(ice%slow_pelist) callslow_ice_chksum('MAIN_LOOP-',nc) endif If you are on the global pelist before you enter this routine using the above call, you can return to the global pelist by invoking callmpp_set_current_pelist() after you exit. This is only necessary if you need to return to the global pelist.

parameterdescription.para: id to label CHECKSUMS in stdout

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls subroutine that will print out checksums of the elements of the appropriate type. For coupled models typically these types are not defined on all processors. It is assumed that the appropriate pelist has been set before entering this routine. This can be achieved in the following way. if(ocean%is_ocean_pe)then callmpp_set_current_pelist(ocean%pelist) callocean_chksum('MAIN_LOOP-',nc) endif If you are on the global pelist before you enter this routine using the above call, you can return to the global pelist by invoking callmpp_set_current_pelist() after you exit. This is only necessary if you need to return to the global pelist.

parameterdescription.para: ID labelling the set of CHECKSUMS

memberdef.argsstring: (coupler_clocks, Atm, Land, Ice, Ocean, ensemble_pelist, slow_ice_ocean_pelist, ensemble_id)
memberdef.name: coupler_set_clock_ids

briefdescription.para: This subroutine sets the ID for clocks used in coupler_main.

parameterdescription.para: Atm, required to retrieve pe information
Land, required to retrieve pe information
Ocean, required to retrieve pe information
Ice, required to retrieve pe information
ensemble_id used as index in ensemble_pelist

memberdef.argsstring: (Time, Atm, Land, Ice, Ocean_state, coupler_clocks, init_stocks, finish_stocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_flux_init_finish_stocks

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_init_stocks or does the final call to flux_check_stocks.

parameterdescription.para: control flags to either call flux_init_stocks or the final flux_check_stocks

memberdef.argsstring: (nc, Time, Atm, Land, Ice, Ocean_state, coupler_clocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_flux_check_stocks

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_check_stocks. Clocks and pelists are set before and after call to flux_check_stocks.
This subroutine calls flux_ocean_to_ice. Clocks and pelists are set before and after call flux_ocean_to_ice.
This subroutine calls flux_ocean_to_ice Clocks are set before and after call flux_ice_to_ocean. Current pelist is set when optional arguments are present and set_current_slow_ice_ocean_pelist=.True.

inbodydescription.para: mpp_set_current_pelist(slow_ice_ocean_pelist) is not required if coupler_flux_ice_to_ocean is being called after coupler_flux_ocean_to_ice: mpp_set_current_pelist(slow_ice_ocean_pelist) is called in coupler_flux_ocean_to_ice

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_ocean_to_ice_finish and unpack_ocean_ice_boundary. Clocks and pelists are set before/after the calls. Checksum is computed if do_chksum=.True.
This subroutine calls exchange_slow_to_fast_ice Clocks and pelists are set before/after the calls.
This subroutine calls exchange_fast_to_slow_ice. Clocks are set before and after the call. The current pelist is set if the optional argument set_ice_current_pelist is set to true.
This subroutine calls set_ice_surface_fields. Clocks and pelist are set before/after the call.
This subroutine calls generate_sfc_xgrid. Clocks are set and before the call.
This subroutine calls atmo_tracer_driver_gather_data. Clocks are set before and after the call.

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Land, Ice, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Time_atmos, current_timestep, coupler_chksum_obj, coupler_clocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_sfc_boundary_layer

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls coupler_sfc_boundary_layer. Chksums are computed if do_chksum = .True. Clocks are set for runtime statistics.
This subroutine calls update_atmos_model_dynamics. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums and memory usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True.

This subroutine calls update_atmos_model_radiation. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums are computed if do_chksum is .True. and do_concurrent_radiation is .False.. Memory usage is computed if do_debug is .True.

inbodydescription.para: cannot put mpp_chksum for concurrent_radiation as it requires the ability to have two different OpenMP threads inside of MPI at the same time which is not currently allowed

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls update_atmos_model_down. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums and memory usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True.

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Land, Ice, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Atmos_land_boundary, Atmos_ice_boundary, Time_atmos, current_timestep, coupler_clocks, coupler_chksum_obj)
memberdef.name: coupler_flux_down_from_atmos

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_down_from_atmos. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums are computed if do_chksum = .True.

parameterdescription.para: Time_atmos FmsTime_type containing time in seconds

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls update_land_model_fast. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums and memory usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True.

parameterdescription.para: Atmpelist to reset the pelist to Atmpelist

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls update_ice_model_fast. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums and memory usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True.

parameterdescription.para: Atmpelist to reset the pelist to Atmpelist

memberdef.argsstring: (Land, Ice, Land_ice_atmos_boundary, Atmos_land_boundary, Atmos_ice_boundary, Time_atmos, current_timestep, coupler_chksum_obj, coupler_clocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_flux_up_to_atmos

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_up_to_atmos. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums are computed if do_chksum is .True.
This subroutine calls update_atmos_model_up. Clocks are set for runtime statistics. Chksums and memory usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True.
This subroutine calls flux_atmos_to_ocean and calls flux_ex_arrays_dealloc.
This subroutine calls update_atmos_model_state. Chksums are mem usage are computed if do_chksum and do_debug are .True. respectively.
In this subroutine, update_land model_slow is called by the Landpes. The atm_pelist are only required to set the clocks. Chksums are computed if do_chksum = .True.

memberdef.argsstring: (Land, Ice, Land_ice_boundary, Time, current_timestep, coupler_chksum_obj, coupler_clocks)
memberdef.name: coupler_flux_land_to_ice

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls flux_land_to_ice. Chksums are computed if do_chksum = .True.
This subroutine calls ice_model_fast_cleanup and unpack_land_ice_boundary.

inbodydescription.para: These two calls occur on whichever PEs handle the fast ice processess.

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls update_ice_model_slow and flux_ice_to_ocean_stocks.

memberdef.argsstring: (Ocean, Ocean_state, Ice_ocean_boundary, Time_ocean, Time_step_cpld, current_timestep, coupler_chksum_obj)
memberdef.name: coupler_update_ocean_model

briefdescription.para: This subroutine calls update_ocean_model. Chksums are computed if do_chksum = .True.

memberdef.argsstring: (Atm, Ice, Ocean, Ocean_state, Ocn_bc_restart, Ice_bc_restart, Time_current, Time_restart, Time_restart_current, Time_start)
memberdef.name: coupler_intermediate_restart

briefdescription.para: Thie subroutine calls component restarts and coupler_restart where the intermediate restart files is produced in the latter calls. Time_restart is the next timestep where the intermediate restart file will be written out. Time_restart_current records the current restart time.

parameterdescription.para: current Timestep and model start time

Restart files will be written when Time=>Time_restart. Time_restart is incremented by restart_interval Time_restart_current records the current timestep the restart file is being written. Time_restart_current does not necessary = Time_restart.

Restart files will be written when Time=>Time_restart. Time_restart is incremented by restart_interval Time_restart_current records the current timestep the restart file is being written. Time_restart_current does not necessary = Time_restart.

briefdescription.para: This subroutine mainly prints out the current timestep in the stdout. Chksum is computed if do_chksum = .True.
